title: Bizenghast, Volume 7
description: The final battle rages for the lives and souls of the inhabitants of Bizenghast, and no one is safe anymore. Shocking revelations of the town's dark history continue to emerge, and Dinah's struggle will go beyond the borders of the mausoleum, beyond Bizenghast itself...and perhaps even beyond the borders of our world!
author: M. Alice LeGrow
